text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia multicaulis is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Central America and Mexico (from Chiapas north to Hidalgo).
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Wildfire'
xVrieslandsia 'Blazing Tropics'
xVrieslandsia 'Golden Touch'
xVrieslandsia 'Spiraling Flame'
xVrieslandsia 'Swamp Fire'
